mapper.select: SELECT A.CUSTOMER_TYPE as CUSTOMER_TYPE, A.IMG_FILE_PATH as IMG_FILE_PATH, A.PASSWORD_EXPIRE_POLICY as PASSWORD_EXPIRE_POLICY, A.LOGIN_TYPE as LOGIN_TYPE, A.TEMP_FILE_PATH as TEMP_FILE_PATH, A.TOKEN_PARAMETER as TOKEN_PARAMETER FROM T_COM_CONFIG A WHERE 1=1 AND CUSTOMER_TYPE = #{customerType}
